name: Keychron Q1 Pro
description: Premium 75% wireless mechanical keyboard with full aluminum body, hot-swappable switches, QMK/VIA support, and 1000Hz polling rate. Features south-facing RGB, double-gasket mount design, and PBT keycaps.

reviews.review_text: The typing experience is phenomenal. Build quality rivals keyboards twice the price.
Hot-swap feature is amazing. Already tried 3 different switches!
Great board but took some time to configure VIA properly.
